title: Ping Spiking
body:
Hey there,
I need help my ping used to stay at 27ms but this week it keeps going to 100and going back down but it never stops.Any idea what could be causing that?

replies.body: Idk about you but im using bell as connection

We've had reports from players on similar ISPs and Network Operators of similar issues with latency. I'd like you to run a traceroute log with [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) so we can see where the spikes are happening. After loading up the app, just plug **104.160.131.1** into the host field and start the trace. After you've let it run for 5 minutes or longer, export your results as text and paste them in a reply.

Let me know if you run into any issues with this.
I have the same issue. Ever since the new patch I've been experiencing higher ping and random lag spikes. Makes it hard to play the game.
